name: Diary Of A Madman (GamesByBass)
description:
I released Diary Of A Madman 2019 as "The Reckless". It is a short story about a dissapeared married couple.  You just have to find your way through to the end, but there are several pages hidden in the game that tells you the story of the madman. 

The policereport (here below the screenhots) gives you a hint of how much pages there are hidden.

It is a simple 1st person Adventure, for a few minutres of fun.

It was my first adventure like this before I made Akui, so it is a little rough around the edges, but I finished it in about 4 weeks or so.

Only the music is new, the old soundtrack was a bit too rough for the setting.

All the best, BASS
